metadata.title: CVE-2022-27227 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In PowerDNS Authoritative Server before 4.4.3, 4.5.x before 4.5.4, and4.6.x before 4.6.1 and PowerDNS Recursor before 4.4.8, 4.5.x before 4.5.8,and 4.6.x before 4.6.1, insufficient validation of an IXFR end conditioncauses incomplete zone transfers to be handled as successful transfers.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
